title: Portfolio
decription: My portfolio website showcases the perfect marriage of aesthetics and technology. With its beautiful design, seamless interactivity, and the power of ReactJS and Framer Motion, it encapsulates my skills and creativity in a visually stunning and engaging way.

title: Sharepro
decription: SharePro is a photo/images sharing platform where you can share photo/images throught the internet securely.
dependancies: HTML/CSS, REACT, NODEJS, MONGODB, BCRYPTJS, CLOUDINARY

title: Ninjastore
